channel.title: Guido Minieri blog
channel.description: Recent content on Guido Minieri blog

item.title: My first blog post
item.description: Here it is… This is my first (ahem second) blog post, I mean, ever. I’m quite excited to start this journey (again), but I’m left with some doubts: is this going to be an enriching experience? will I be able to keep the commitment and write every now and then? I’m feeling a lot like this: This is me, when I do stuff Anyways, I finish the post on a more serious note with a quote that I like very much, that I hope will accompany me during this quest for betterment:
